title: Sausage 'n Kraut Recipe
description: This German-inspired kraut and weenies dish features delicious grilled sausage that's sliced and served with sauerkraut in a buttery sauce.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines European German Sausage 'n Kraut 4.2 (13) 5 Reviews 2 Photos A great and super fast German dish of kraut and weenies with a sweet and sour flavor. Serve piping hot with your choice of sides. Submitted by KHOERNER Updated on November 26, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 2 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 (12 ounce) package pork sausage, halved and cut into 4-inch pieces 2 tablespoons vegetable oil butter spread 1 (32 ounce) jar sauerkraut, drained 1 teaspoon dried celery flakes 1 tablespoon dried minced onion 1 teaspoon caraway seeds 2 tablespoons brown sugar ground black pepper to taste Directions Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Grill sausages on the preheated grill until browned, about 3 minutes on each side. Cut cooked sausage into 1/2-inch slices. While the sausage is cooking, melt butter spread in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in sauerkraut, celery flakes, onion, caraway seeds, brown sugar, and pepper. Cook and stir until sauerkraut begins to brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in sausage slices. Serve hot. Add Your Photo Photos of Sausage 'n Kraut 01 of 02 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 02 Photo by  hbcharley 03/23/2015 I added an apple, used celery seed (what I had on hand) and kielbasa. It was quick and easy and quite tasty. I also used only 24 oz of sauerkraut and it made plenty!! 1 You’ll Also Love Grilled Sauerkraut-Stuffed Kielbasa 1 Rating Smoky Grilled Pork Chops 746 Ratings Barbequed Steelhead Trout 184 Ratings Glazed Grilled Pork Chops 21 Ratings Doreen's Ham Slices on the Grill 176 Ratings Grilled Italian Pork Chops 66 Ratings Chicken Kabobs 59 Ratings Asian Barbecue Burgers 64 Ratings Soy and Honey Pork Chops 100 Ratings Beer Brats 375 Ratings Cheesy Bacon Ultimate Dogs 5 Ratings Chipotle Taco Burger 6 Ratings Jan's Blueberry and Flax Burgers (Paleo) Simply Swordfish 92 Ratings German Chicken 87 Ratings Apple Honey Glazed Chicken 77 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: KHOERNER
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.;Grill sausages on the preheated grill until browned, about 3 minutes on each side. Cut cooked sausage into 1/2-inch slices.;While the sausage is cooking, melt butter spread in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in sauerkraut, celery flakes, onion, caraway seeds, brown sugar, and pepper. Cook and stir until sauerkraut begins to brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in sausage slices. Serve hot.
